segment.source: Converting WDCML to Markdown for Open Publishing
segment.target: Converting WDCML to Markdown for Open Publishing

segment.source: This topic describes how to convert WDCML to Markdown that validates and renders correctly in the MSDN Open Publishing environment.
segment.target: This topic describes how to convert WDCML to Markdown that validates and renders correctly in the MSDN Open Publishing environment.

segment.source: The preferred way to do this is by using the built-in support in the cbx build command.
segment.target: The preferred way to do this is by using the built-in support in the cbx build command.

segment.source: Here's how:
segment.target: Here's how:

segment.source: Go to IDWeb and ensure that you are a member of the MSDN Reporting SG for your domain.
segment.target: Go to IDWeb and ensure that you are a member of the MSDN Reporting SG for your domain.

segment.source: You may need to wait up to 24 hours for permissions to propagate.
segment.target: You may need to wait up to 24 hours for permissions to propagate.

segment.source: Install the latest release of Pandoc. Pandoc is updated periodically, so if it's been a while since you installed it, consider upgrading. A recent fix improved table rendering, for example. By default, Pandoc installs to c:\Users\<alias>\AppData\Local\Pandoc\, which is added to your PATH.
segment.target: Install the latest release of Pandoc. Pandoc is updated periodically, so if it's been a while since you installed it, consider upgrading. A recent fix improved table rendering, for example. By default, Pandoc installs to c:\Users\<alias>\AppData\Local\Pandoc\, which is added to your PATH.

segment.source: Do an sd sync.
segment.target: Do an sd sync.

segment.source: Use cbx msdn markdown to build your project into .md files.
segment.target: Use cbx msdn markdown to build your project into .md files.

segment.source: After the regular cbx build, you will see two passes with progress bars.
segment.target: After the regular cbx build, you will see two passes with progress bars.

segment.source: The first is a fast pass to change .md formatting to match OP requirements.
segment.target: The first is a fast pass to change .md formatting to match OP requirements.

segment.source: The second is the A keyword conversion to URLs, which takes significantly longer.
segment.target: The second is the A keyword conversion to URLs, which takes significantly longer.

segment.source: The whole conversion can take up to an hour for a project containing 1500 topics.
segment.target: The whole conversion can take up to an hour for a project containing 1500 topics.

segment.source: If the database pass fails, you will see:
segment.target: If the database pass fails, you will see:

segment.source: Error connecting to db server.
segment.target: Error connecting to db server.

segment.source: Ensure that you have perms on the MSDN Reporting SG.
segment.target: Ensure that you have perms on the MSDN Reporting SG.

segment.source: Sometimes database access can be problematic.
segment.target: Sometimes database access can be problematic.

segment.source: If you can't connect, try again a couple hours later.
segment.target: If you can't connect, try again a couple hours later.

segment.source: PROTIP: On rare occasions (ask Jason), you may need to update the local version of convert-keywords.ps1 with the fully qualified name of the reporting server: reporting.mtps.glbdns2.microsoft.com.
segment.target: PROTIP: On rare occasions (ask Jason), you may need to update the local version of convert-keywords.ps1 with the fully qualified name of the reporting server: reporting.mtps.glbdns2.microsoft.com.

segment.source: Manual Conversion
segment.target: Manual Conversion

segment.source: If you have problems with the automation, please send a bug report to DDPUB.
segment.target: If you have problems with the automation, please send a bug report to DDPUB.

segment.source: The following steps are what the first pass above does.
segment.target: The following steps are what the first pass above does.

segment.source: They are listed here for posterity.
segment.target: They are listed here for posterity.

segment.source: Fix links as follows:
segment.target: Fix links as follows:

segment.source: Replace .htm link suffixes with .md, for in-project targets, for example:
segment.target: Replace .htm link suffixes with .md, for in-project targets, for example:

segment.source: [Creating a Driver From Existing Source Files](creating_a_driver_from_existing_source_files.htm).
segment.target: [Creating a Driver From Existing Source Files](creating_a_driver_from_existing_source_files.htm).

segment.source: Replace A keywords with URLs, for example:
segment.target: Replace A keywords with URLs, for example:

segment.source: Remove In This Section links at the top
segment.target: Remove In This Section links at the top

segment.source: Switch references to upper case Images directory to images: ![Visual Studio Solution Explorer Driver Package Project](images/VsSlnExplorer.png)
segment.target: Switch references to upper case Images directory to images: ![Visual Studio Solution Explorer Driver Package Project](images/VsSlnExplorer.png)

segment.source: Remove any %20 in URLs if they exist: [MSBuild](%20http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=262804)
segment.target: Remove any %20 in URLs if they exist: [MSBuild](%20http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=262804)

segment.source: If See Also section is present, prepend asterisks to create bulleted list.
segment.target: If See Also section is present, prepend asterisks to create bulleted list.

segment.source: If existing, delete second occurrence of local target string: [Manually installing WDTF on a test computer](dtf.runtime_library#manual_install_wdtf#manual_install_wdtf)
segment.target: If existing, delete second occurrence of local target string: [Manually installing WDTF on a test computer](dtf.runtime_library#manual_install_wdtf#manual_install_wdtf)

segment.source: Update embedded video links from: ![]()
segment.target: Update embedded video links from: ![]()

segment.source: to look like this:
segment.target: to look like this:

segment.source: Note: JasGro to follow up on video plans and correct URL
segment.target: Note: JasGro to follow up on video plans and correct URL

segment.source: Remove initial span so that OP creates correct topic title for text on browser tab:
segment.target: Remove initial span so that OP creates correct topic title for text on browser tab:

segment.source: Remove nested parenthetical version selector (v=vs.85, e.g.) from links: [InfVerif](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn929319(v=vs.85).aspx)
segment.target: Remove nested parenthetical version selector (v=vs.85, e.g.) from links: [InfVerif](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn929319(v=vs.85).aspx)

segment.source: (Hardware team only) For mailto links, replace nested parentheses with %28, %29: [Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20Analyzing%20a%20Driver%20Using%20Code%20Analysis%20and%20Verification%20Tools%20%20RELEASE:%20(9/30/2015)&body=... Topics that contain parentheses in the topic title also cause additional parentheses in the mailto link: [Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20What%20happens%20when%20you%20provision%20a%20computer%20(WDK%208.0)%20%20RELEASE:%20%289/30/2015%29
segment.target: (Hardware team only) For mailto links, replace nested parentheses with %28, %29: [Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20Analyzing%20a%20Driver%20Using%20Code%20Analysis%20and%20Verification%20Tools%20%20RELEASE:%20(9/30/2015)&body=... Topics that contain parentheses in the topic title also cause additional parentheses in the mailto link: [Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20What%20happens%20when%20you%20provision%20a%20computer%20(WDK%208.0)%20%20RELEASE:%20%289/30/2015%29

segment.source: Remove extra carriage returns that occur after a Note inside a numbered list item, because it causes OP to start numbering again from 1.
segment.target: Remove extra carriage returns that occur after a Note inside a numbered list item, because it causes OP to start numbering again from 1.

segment.source: Leave one blank line remaining.
segment.target: Leave one blank line remaining.

segment.source: Remove copyright line: `© 2015 Microsoft.
segment.target: Remove copyright line: `© 2015 Microsoft.

segment.source: All rights reserved.`
segment.target: All rights reserved.`

segment.source: Change any image file suffixes to lower case, e.g., *.png not *.PNG.
segment.target: Change any image file suffixes to lower case, e.g., *.png not *.PNG.

segment.source: Post-markdown conversion steps
segment.target: Post-markdown conversion steps

segment.source: Create TOC.md in parent directory.
segment.target: Create TOC.md in parent directory.
